data.message:
Don't Forget 

One of the greatest, in my opinion the greatest ... your so 
famous but still humble, many wise turns and never a lesson fumbled... Time turns but honour is always ready for hates royal rumble... Early it was here we are with no fear ,better yet alone looking for some to help mould a thrown... Rap games remoulded in mastery that's never froze , you diving and he said it's time you dove into a spiral of cones only known as full grown... Words of fear and retaliation but in reality it was for a promotional creation... Said the right thing when it's wrong and the wrong thing when it's right, but all ever seen or heard were them mocking birds all night .
